context: Global automotive manufacturer (50,000 employees, $25B revenue) evaluating digital transformation of supply chain operations to improve efficiency and reduce costs

request.purpose: Implement end-to-end digital supply chain platform with IoT sensors, blockchain tracking, and AI demand forecasting
request.justification: Current manual processes causing 15% inventory carrying costs and 20% supply disruption incidents

decision_process.outcome: Approved for pilot phase with $25M initial investment
Pilot successful - 12% cost reduction and 30% faster replenishment
Approved full rollout with phased implementation over 24 months

business_impact.expected_outcome: 15-20% reduction in supply chain costs, 25% improvement in on-time delivery, enhanced supplier visibility

lessons_learned: Early supplier engagement critical for adoption, pilot phase essential for risk mitigation, change management budget underestimated
